title: Rewrite the Function in Standard Form
text: Express the function in the general form of a secant function: $$h(x)=Asec(Bx-C)$$.

title: Rewrite the Function in Standard Form
text: What is the standard form of the given argument?

title: Find the Period
text: For the standard secant function $$f(x)=Asec(Bx-C)$$, the period is $$\frac{2\pi}{|B|}$$. So T $$=$$ $$\frac{2\pi}{\frac{\pi}{4}}$$ $$=$$ $$8$$.

title: Find the Horizontal Shift
text: For the standard secant function $$f(x)=Atan(Bx-C)$$, the phase shift is $$\frac{C}{B}$$. So $$h=\frac{-\left(\frac{\pi}{4}\right)}{\frac{\pi}{4}}=-1$$
